column1: List of Projects as per Smart City Proposal : Salem

column2:
Bus terminal Development. Removal of encroachments and Construction of
state-of-the art Transit Hub
Smart  Parking: On street & MLCP (Transit Hub &  VOC market)
Public Transport improvement: Shuttle bus service, conversion to Electric / CNG buses, Smart bus shelters

Streetscape  redesign:  Footpath,  parking  bays,  street  furniture,  signage,
landscape,  paving,  NMT zones, etc.

IT Integration: Intelligent  signals,  Free public   Wi-fi, Display  boards, GPS
tracking,  real time arrival/departure,    etc.
Renovation of V.O.C Market  revised  layout and storage   facilities

River  Channel  Improvement:   Parapet  wall  and Fencing,  lighting and street
scoping

column1: Note-  This only indicates cost of individual projects given in the SCP. The total value of SCP may additionally include other costs such as DPR preparation, PMC, O&M etc.
